article: I'm an operating engineer, running crane in New York City. I was in the countryside, playing golf when we got the call that a plane had  _  the World Trade Centre. I called my wife and told her not to  worry about  me, and that I would stay in  _  with her. I took the subway. It stopped at West Fourth Street, so I had to  _  the rest of the way. I started to ask  _  in which my crane might be  _  a whistle blew suddenly warning us of some danger. I saw people running away and I really didn't know what to do. So I did the same, too.
